title: High Half-Elf
content:
ures

Base Racial Speed: Move up to 9m per turn. Civil Militia: Proficiency with Spears, Pikes, Halberds, and Glaives, Light Armour and Shield. Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12 m.

High Half-Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the High Half-Elf race used to feature +2 Charisma and another +2 Ability points of their choice. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score
